word_group.brief_definition: 过季, 反季节, 不合时令
圣诞快乐(圣诞节祝贺语)

bilingual.target: 春天是我最喜欢的季节。
秋天是我最喜欢的季节！

bilingual.source: Which season do you like best, Mike?
bilingual.target: 你最喜欢哪个季节，迈克？

bilingual.source: Spring is my favourite season of the year.
bilingual.target: 春天是我一年中最喜欢的季节。

bilingual.source: Which season do you like best, Miss White?
bilingual.target: 怀特小姐，你最喜欢哪个季节？

bilingual.source: This photo was taken in autumn, which is my favourite season.
bilingual.target: 这张照片是在秋天拍的，这是我最喜欢的季节。

bilingual.source: Summer is the season in which it is best to practise outside with your team.
bilingual.target: 夏天是和你的团队在外面练习的最佳季节。

bilingual.source: Originally, Trung Thu came about as a way for parents to make up for lost time with their children after the harvest season.
bilingual.target: 最初，中秋节是父母在收获季节后弥补与孩子失去的时间的一种方式。

list.abstract: 《Season》是由周笔畅演唱，陈达伟、管启源共同作词，陈达伟作曲，Tre Jean-Marie和Ben Macklin共同编曲的一首国语流行歌曲，发行于2018年7月11日，收录于专辑《重命名》中。
《season》是韩庚演唱的一首歌曲，该曲目收录在韩庚2015年《三庚迷你数字专辑II》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Again? It was tornado season. And it was an aluminum house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 又？当时是狂风季节，那是个临时工棚。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, everybody. It's the holidays, a season to give thanks for our many blessings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家好，现在是假期，这是一个对我们的很多福祉给出感谢的季节。

yingyinNormal.en: And along with the season comes the Constance Billard/ St. Jude's bazaar, where the only thing bizarre are the donated items for sale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这个季节中，我们来到了康士坦次的圣犹太集市，这里卖的都是人们捐赠的物品。

yingyinNormal.en: We could design the bomb to target some sequence season seismic data. Trigger avalanches.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们根据季节性的地震数据引导炸弹爆炸。引发雪崩。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you let me finish? Okay, fine. Go ahead. Season.
yingyinNormal.zh: 能让我说完吗？好，你说吧。季结束。

yingyinNormal.en: Since it's not bee season, you can have my epinephrine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然现在没蜜蜂出没，你可以用我的肾上腺素。

yingyinNormal.en: We already watched the season two DVDs. Not with commentary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二季的DVD我们已经看过了。但评论音轨还没看。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, season tickets. Season tickets, do you know what that means?
yingyinNormal.zh: 季票耶！你知道那代表什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Heroes gradually lowered the quality season by season till we were grateful it ended.
yingyinNormal.zh: 《英雄》的剧情一季比一季烂，到结尾时，观众还感到庆幸呢。

yingyinNormal.en: No, that's the season two finale. That was quite the cliffhanger. I'm going to re-watch it before season three starts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，这是它的第二季季末集呢，最后留了个大悬念，第三季开始前我要再温习一遍剧情。

yingyinNormal.en: There are some owners who are willing to forego the season.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一些老板愿意走在这个赛季之前

yingyinNormal.en: Jeremy Lin, 38 points. It's the most by a knick this season.
yingyinNormal.zh: 林书豪38分，本赛季尼克斯队球员的得分新高

yingyinNormal.en: Now we've just got to season the lamb steaks for searing now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把调好味的羊排煎一下。

yingyinNormal.en: If we need to lose an entire season, we should go ahead and do it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果整个赛季都没了，那也只能这么干了

yingyinNormal.en: Mabel Lane Fox?So you've caught the greatest heiress of the season.
yingyinNormal.zh: 梅布尔·莱恩·福克斯你攀上了社交季中最好的女继承人。

yingyinNormal.en: I see. If you lose the last game of the season, nobody gives a shit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明白，如果你输了赛季最后一场，就什么也得不到。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't need to tell you, in Los Angeles, sandal season is year round.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用我说你们也知道，在洛杉矶，全年都是拖鞋季。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me, are you pleased with your progress this season? I certainly am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这一季的进度你还满意吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: I suppose you were a widow, after all, and not a deb in her first season.
yingyinNormal.zh: 毕竟你是个寡妇，不是什么小姑娘了。

yingyinNormal.en: There's not a lot of faith there, which is strange after a 102 win season.
yingyinNormal.zh: 上赛季赢了一百零二场还没信心，这也太奇怪了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 季节的；季节性的；随时节波动的

word_family.mean: n. 季节；季；时节；节期；一段时间；赛季；旺季；当令期；发情期；社交活动时节

sense_info_list.en: one of the four quarters into which a year is commonly divided

examination_example.sentence: They reimagined the 300-year-old score by injecting the latest climate prediction data for each <highlight>season</highlight>—provided by Monash University's Climate Change Communication Research Hub.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们通过加入蒙纳士大学气候变化传播研究中心提供的每个季节的最新气候预测数据，重新构思了这首300年前的乐曲。

examination_example.sentence: The reworked version of The Four <highlight>Seasons</highlight> is mentioned to show that art can offer audiences easy access to science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 文章提到改编版的《四季》是为了表明艺术可以让观众轻松接触科学。

examination_example.sentence: The Sydney Symphony Orchestra performed a reworked version of Antonio Vivaldi's The Four <highlight>Seasons</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 悉尼交响乐团演奏了安东尼奥·维瓦尔第的《四季》的改编版本。

sense_info_list.en: add flavor to (food) with spices and herbs
a period of time associated with something special
a set or sequence of related television programs

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 加作料于；风干处理；（season的过去式和过去分词）
adj. 季节的；季节性的；随时节波动的

word_family.mean: n. 季节；季；时节；节期；一段时间；赛季；旺季；当令期；发情期；社交活动时节

sense_info_list.en: a period of time associated with something special

examination_example.sentence: That relative strength would be consistent with what was seen in the wilder retail industry during the early part of the holiday <highlight>season</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种相对的优势将与假日季节初期零售业的景象相一致。

sense_info_list.en: one of the four quarters into which a year is commonly divided

examination_example.sentence: There was little evidence that the strategy had a significant effect on sales, particularly as the hype (炒作) slows across the <highlight>season</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有什么证据表明该策略对销售有重大影响，尤其是在整个季节的炒作放缓的情况下。

sense_info_list.en: a set or sequence of related television programs

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 季节性地；周期性地
adj. 季节的；季节性的；随时节波动的

word_family.mean: n. 季节；季；时节；节期；一段时间；赛季；旺季；当令期；发情期；社交活动时节

sense_info_list.en: one of the four quarters into which a year is commonly divided

examination_example.sentence: January is usually the stores' slow <highlight>season</highlight> for donations because it's cold and people don't want to bother, but not this January.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一月份通常是商店捐赠的淡季，因为天气很冷，人们不想打扰，但今年的一月份不是这样。

sense_info_list.en: a set or sequence of related television programs

examination_example.sentence: The 2016 <highlight>season</highlight> runs through June 26 and features sessions facilitated by everyone from dancers to domestic workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2016年，该赛季持续到6月26日，从舞蹈家到家政工人，每位参与者都为这段活动的顺利开展提供便利。

sense_info_list.en: a period of time associated with something special

examination_example.sentence: So, to evaluate the risks of infection, the study team flew on 10 different flights in the U.S. during the flu <highlight>season</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，为了评估感染的风险，研究小组在流感季节期间在美国乘坐了10个不同的航班。

sense_info_list.en: add flavor to (food) with spices and herbs

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 调味品；佐料；干燥处理；风干
adj. 季节的；季节性的；随时节波动的

word_family.mean: n. 季节；季；时节；节期；一段时间；赛季；旺季；当令期；发情期；社交活动时节

examination_example.sentence: The unwilling parent organizes the meal schedule, sends out emails, and collects money for end-of-<highlight>season</highlight> gifts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不甘心的家长组织好了用餐时间表，发出邮件，还筹钱准备季末礼物。

examination_example.sentence: The coach is able to focus on the kids while the other parents are relieved to be off the hook for another <highlight>season</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教练可以把注意力集中在孩子身上，而其他家长则可以松一口气，不用再为下一个赛季操心了。

examination_example.sentence: Still, most of us volunteers breathe a sigh of relief when the <highlight>season</highlight> comes to a close.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管如此，当赛季结束时，我们大多数志愿者都松了一口气。

examination_example.sentence: In the spring, a <highlight>season</highlight> when we are learning new rhythms of life, many of us find comfort in the natural world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 春天是我们学习生活新节奏的季节，许多人享受着大自然带来的舒适。

examination_example.sentence: In pre-Classical Greece, for instance, people "corrected" official calendars by shifting dates forward or backward to reflect the change of <highlight>season</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，在前古典时期的希腊，人们通过向前或向后移动日期来“修正”官方日历，以反映季节的变化。

examination_example.sentence: My parents made it a point for their two kids to spend time outside, no matter the weather or <highlight>season</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的父母让他们的两个孩子无论天气或季节，都要花时间在户外。

examination_example.sentence: First, clean it and <highlight>season</highlight> it with your choice of spices (调料).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，清洗它并用你选择的香料调味。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 季节的；季节性的；随时节波动的

word_family.mean: n. 季节；季；时节；节期；一段时间；赛季；旺季；当令期；发情期；社交活动时节

sense_info_list.en: one of the four quarters into which a year is commonly divided

examination_example.sentence: Isn't spring a beautiful <highlight>season</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 春天不是一个美丽的季节吗?

examination_example.sentence: The coldest <highlight>season</highlight> of the year is winter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一年中最冷的季节是冬天。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>season</highlight> is short, but it has not ended yet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个季节很短，但它还没有结束。

sense_info_list.en: a period of time associated with something special

examination_example.sentence: Whenever the exam <highlight>season</highlight> comes, stress（焦虑） may come along.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每当考试季到来时，压力就会随之而来。

examination_example.sentence: The villagers expect that the building of the bridge will be completed before the rainy <highlight>season</highlight> comes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 村民们希望这座桥能在雨季到来之前建成。

examination_example.sentence: The rainy <highlight>season</highlight> usually takes place from June to September in my hometown.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我的家乡，雨季通常是从六月到九月。

sense_info_list.en: a set or sequence of related television programs

examination_example.sentence: Enjoy new <highlight>season</highlight> of great dramas written by Hans Christian Andersen at the music hall!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在音乐厅欣赏Hans Christian Andersen创作的新一季伟大戏剧!
